page.title: 07CALVERLEY VILLAGE
page.content: Calverley as a village is a friendly place to be in.The people are friendly kind and helpful.It is a quiet place and there is a church called St. Wilfrid's.Most of the village is houses but there is some open land. It has all the amenities, shops,park, golf course,public houses etc.Calverley has many old houses but also some new ones. There are two schools in the village.Calverley Church of England School and Parkside School. They are both Junior and Infant Schools.If you look around Calverley you will notice that it is in open country as there are farms and open fields around.every year Calverley Church has a Garden Fete for anybody who wants to come and the Church School provides the Rose Queen as well as the Maypole Dancers and Country Dancers.
